text: Yadav Chandra Sharma () is the current Governor of Bagmati Province. He was appointed as the governor per Article 163 (2) of the Constitution of Nepal by the president Bidya Devi Bhandari on the recommendation of the Council of Ministers of the Government of Nepal on 20 August 2021. He was the personal secretary of Madhav Kumar Nepal when Nepal was Prime Minister. ==References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Nepalese politicians Category:Governors of Provinces of Nepal
title: Yadav Chandra Sharma
